Class ProjectScannerService

java.lang.Object
org.nevertouchgrass.prolific.service.scaners.ProjectScannerService
@Service @DependsOn("userSettingsService") public class ProjectScannerService extends Object
Service that scans directories and finds projects

  • Method Details

    • scanForProjects

      public Set<Path> scanForProjects(String rootDirectory, Consumer<Path> onFind)
      Scan for projects in the given root directory
      Parameters:
      rootDirectory - directory to scan
      onFind - callback for each found project
      Returns:
      Set of found project paths
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if scanning is already in progress

    • scanForProjects

      public Set<Path> scanForProjects(String rootDirectory)
      Scan for projects in the given root directory
      Parameters:
      rootDirectory - directory to scan
      Returns:
      Set of found project paths
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if scanning is already in progress

    • cancelScanning

      public void cancelScanning()
      Cancel the current scanning operation. Has no effect if no scanning is in progress.

    • isScanning

      public boolean isScanning()
      Check if scanning is currently in progress
      Returns:
      true if scanning is in progress, false otherwise

    • startSearching

      public Set<Path> startSearching(Path root, Consumer<Path> onFind)
